grade: Story shall be good for child in grade [GRADE].
locale: Locale of the story shall be [LANGUAGE] [LOCALE].
max_words: Maximum words in the story shall be [MAX_WORDS].
max_syllables: Maximum syllables in the words shall be [MAX_SYLLABLES].
max_questions: Create minimum 1 question per page. Do not create more than [MAX_QUESTIONS] questions in total on all pages.
title: [TITLE]
senteces_per_page: Story shall be broken into pages and each page shall have maximum [SENTENCES_PER_PAGE] sentences.
least_page: There shall be at least 5 pages.
min_max_per_page: Story shall be broken into [minimum MIN_PAGES & maximum MAX_PAGES] pages.
